summary:
Sometimes I feel like Simon & Garfunkel wrote this song precisely so that Disturbed could perform it. 
Years (and many, many listens) later and it still gives me chills. 

 HeyDingus is a blog by Jarrod Blundy about technology, the great outdoors, and other musings...

summary: Next allows you to do server-side data-fetching, but what happens when that data needs to change on the client.  This brief tutorial shows how to re-fetch the props without doing a full server reload
